Key Match Events: Giancarlo Stanton hit a game-tying home run in the 6th inning
Juan Soto hit a walk-off home run in the 10th inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees won their first pennant in 15 years
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians' bullpen was heavily relied upon due to their starters' short outings
Others: The Yankees' starting pitchers lasted between 4 and 6 innings in each game
